item.title: Stellantis 新裁员意味着意大利将有超过 3,000 个职位空缺
item.description: 菲亚特汽车制造商 Stellantis 周三与意大利工会签署了进一步的自愿裁员协议，这意味着该汽车制造商可能在意大利裁员 3000 多人。【原文：Stellantis , the maker of Fiat cars, on Wednesday signed further deals with unions in Italy for voluntary lay-offs, meaning the automaker could cut its workforce by a total of over 3,000 roles in the country.】

item.title: 聚焦：波音领导层如何被自己的客户 "炒鱿鱼
item.description: 历时 80 天。但对于航空业来说，这已经足够了。【原文：It took 80 days. But for the airline industry, enough was enough.】

item.title: 独家报道国内供应减少，俄罗斯增加从白俄罗斯进口汽油
item.description: 四位工业和贸易消息人士周三称，由于俄罗斯炼油厂在无人机袭击后进行了计划外维修，俄罗斯已在三月份增加了从邻国白俄罗斯的汽油进口量，以应对国内市场汽油短缺的风险。【原文：Russia has increased gasoline imports from neighbouring Belarus in March to tackle the risk of shortages in its domestic market because of unscheduled repairs at Russian refineries after drone attacks, four industry and trade sources said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩轮船悲剧发生后，保险公司将面临数十亿美元的损失
item.description: 消息人士称，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的垮塌可能会使保险公司损失数十亿美元的理赔金，但现在计算这场导致美国最繁忙港口之一关闭的悲剧可能造成的全部经济损失还为时过早。【原文：Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse could cost insurers several billions of dollars in claims, sources say, but it is too early to calculate the likely full financial losses of the tragedy that has shuttered one of the busiest ports in the United States.】

item.title: 俄罗斯公司开始在前 Stellantis 工厂生产雪铁龙汽车
item.description: 俄罗斯汽车技术公司（Automotive Technologies）周三表示，该公司已开始在莫斯科南部一家原属于 Stellantis 的工厂分批组装雪铁龙 C5 Aircross 车型，这些汽车将从 5 月起在经销商处销售。【原文：Russian company Automotive Technologies on Wednesday said it had started assembling Citroen C5 Aircross models in batches at a plant south of Moscow formerly owned by Stellantis , with the cars set to be sold in dealerships from May.】

item.title: 新的人工智能基准测试对用户查询的响应速度
item.description: 人工智能基准测试组织 MLCommons 周三发布了一组新的测试和结果，对顶级硬件运行人工智能应用和响应用户的速度进行了评测。【原文：Artificial intelligence benchmarking group MLCommons on Wednesday released a fresh set of tests and results that rate the speed at which top-of-the-line hardware can run AI applications and respond to users.】

item.title: 美国敦促盟国禁止企业为中国提供关键芯片制造工具服务
item.description: 美国商务部一位官员周三表示，美国正在要求盟国阻止国内公司为中国客户提供某些芯片制造工具的服务，因为美国正在加大力度削弱中国的芯片制造能力。【原文：The United States is asking allies to stop domestic companies from servicing certain chipmaking tools for Chinese customers, a U.S. commerce department official said on Wednesday, as it ramps up efforts to hobble China's chipmaking capabilities.】

item.title: 瑞士央行称第一季度瑞士经济可能有所回升
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周三表示，瑞士 1-3 月份的经济表现可能略好于前几个季度。【原文：Switzerland's economy likely performed slightly better during the January-March period than in the prior quarters, the Swiss National Bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国公司在无人机技术竞赛中支持乌克兰武装部队
item.description: 在英格兰南部的一个匿名仓库里，Evolve Dynamics 公司的工程师们正在研究一种技术，它可以帮助乌克兰的无人侦察机在俄罗斯试图对其进行电子干扰后仍能继续飞行。【原文：In an anonymous warehouse in southern England, engineers at Evolve Dynamics are working on technology that could help keep Ukraine's reconnaissance drones in the sky even after Russia tries to jam them electronically.】

item.title: 代理权争夺战正酣，伊根-琼斯支持激进分子佩尔茨进入迪士尼董事会
item.description: Egan-Jones 已成为第二家支持纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）争取华特迪士尼董事会席位的代理咨询公司，这位激进投资者的资产管理公司周三表示，它将在一场激烈的代理权争夺战中与这家娱乐集团展开较量。【原文：Egan-Jones has become the second proxy advisory firm to back Nelson Peltz's push for board seats at Walt Disney , the activist investor's asset management firm said on Wednesday as it takes on the entertainment conglomerate in a bitter proxy battle.】

item.title: 独家报道：第一量子公司高管与中国官员讨论投资和有争议的铜矿问题
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，加拿大矿商第一量子矿业公司（First Quantum Minerals）的高管上周会见了中国政府官员，讨论了涉及顶级投资者江西铜业股份有限公司的资金和业务方案。【原文：Executives from Canadian miner First Quantum Minerals met with Chinese government officials last week to discuss funding and business options involving top investor Jiangxi Copper Co, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Coinbase 必须面对美国证券监管机构的诉讼
item.description: 曼哈顿一名联邦法官周三表示，美国证券监管机构对 Coinbase 的诉讼可以继续进行，但驳回了该机构对这家美国最大加密货币交易所提出的一项索赔。【原文：A federal judge in Manhattan on Wednesday said the U.S. securities regulator's lawsuit against Coinbase can move forward, but dismissed one claim the agency made against the largest U.S. cryptocurrency exchange.】

item.title: 摩根大通押宝新财富规划工具吸引投资
item.description: 摩根大通试图通过向其 5400 万大通零售客户提供一种新的规划工具，扩大其财富管理业务的覆盖范围并引入更多投资。【原文：JPMorgan Chase seeks to expand the reach of its wealth management business and bring in more investments by offering a new planning tool to its 54 million Chase retail customers.】

item.title: 需求创历史新高，邮轮运营商嘉年华上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 嘉年华公司（Carnival Corp）周三上调了年度利润预期，押注于创纪录的游轮度假需求以及价格上涨。【原文：Carnival Corp , raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, betting on record demand for cruise vacations as well as higher prices.】

item.title: 智利矿业部长敦促 SQM 和天齐公司解决争端
item.description: 智利矿业部长周三敦促智利矿业公司SQM和该公司大股东中国天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp）解决目前的争执，但避免介入双方的私事。【原文：Chile's mining minister on Wednesday urged Chilean miner SQM and China's Tianqi Lithium Corp, a major shareholder in the company, to resolve their ongoing spat, but refrained from weighing into their private matter.】

item.title: Hulu 在 Disney+ 上推出，旨在提高流媒体的使用率
item.description: 华特迪士尼周三完成了将面向普通观众的 Hulu 流媒体服务添加到适合家庭用户的 Disney+ 中，将《熊出没》和《美国恐怖故事》等影片与《莫阿娜》和《冰雪奇缘》放在同一个应用程序中。【原文：Walt Disney completed the addition of the general-audience-focused Hulu streaming service to the family friendly Disney+ on Wednesday, putting titles such as "The Bear" and "American Horror Story" in the same app as "Moana" and "Frozen."】

item.title: 市场回暖，全球首次公开募股（IPO）复苏滞后于第一季度股票销售
item.description: 2024 年，随着经济不确定性的减弱和股市的反弹，全球股票资本市场的交易迎来了三年来最强劲的开端，但首次公开募股的复苏却滞后了。【原文：Dealmaking in global equity capital markets had its strongest start in three years in 2024 as economic uncertainty waned and stocks rallied, but a revival in initial public offerings has lagged.】

item.title: 威士卡和万事达卡降低刷卡手续费的协议将对美国银行造成适度冲击
item.description: 华尔街分析师表示，由于支付网络威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）就限制商家信用卡和借记卡费用达成了 300 亿美元的和解协议，美国银行的盈利可能会受到轻微冲击。【原文：U.S. banks could see a modest hit to their earnings due to the $30 billion settlement to limit credit and debit card fees for merchants by payments networks Visa and Mastercard , Wall Street analysts said.】

item.title: 金佰利公司重组业务，成本增加 15 亿美元
item.description: 金佰利公司（Kimberly-Clark）周三表示，该公司将重组为三个业务部门，以简化业务和削减成本。【原文：Kimberly-Clark said on Wednesday it would reorganize into three business units as the Kleenex tissue maker looks to simplify operations and cut costs.】

item.title: 电子游戏零售商 GameStop 季度销售额大幅下降，业绩下滑
item.description: GameStop 的股价在周三收盘前暴跌超过 18%，因为这家实体视频游戏零售商报告称，由于消费放缓和电子商务公司的竞争加剧，第四季度收入下降。【原文：GameStop's shares slumped more than 18% before the bell on Wednesday, as the brick-and-mortar video game retailer reported a decline in fourth-quarter revenue on the back of a spending slowdown and rising competition from e-commerce firms.】

item.title: ITA 航空公司 2023 年净亏损降至仅 500 万欧元
item.description: 伊塔航空公司（ITA Airways）周三表示，该公司 2023 年的净亏损仅为 500 万欧元（540 万美元），较前一年有了大幅改善，由于运营航班的增加，该公司的收入达到了 24 亿欧元。【原文：ITA Airways posted a 2023 net loss of only 5 million euros ($5.4 million), a strong improvement from the year before, and revenues of 2.4 billion euros amid an increase in the flights it operates, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司首秀表现出色，股价上涨
item.description: 特朗普媒体与科技集团的股票在周三的盘前交易中上涨了 11%，这是该公司首次亮相后的第二天。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group rose 11% in premarket trading on Wednesday, a day after their stellar debut.】

item.title: 欧盟最高法院驳回亚马逊暂停执行欧盟技术规则广告条款的请求
item.description: 欧盟最高法院周三表示，已驳回亚马逊提出的暂停履行公开广告库义务的请求。【原文：The European Union's top court on Wednesday said it had rejected a request by Amazon to suspend its obligation to make an advertisement repository publicly available.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪目标年销售额跃升 20
item.description: 据第一财经（CBN）周三报道，中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪（BYD）将2024年的销售目标定为360万辆，比去年破纪录的销量增长20%。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD set a 3.6 million sales target for 2024, up 20% from its record-breaking sales last year, China Business Network (CBN) reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司的肺癌疗法在晚期试验中获得成功
item.description: Novocure 公司周三表示，其癌症疗法达到了一项晚期试验的主要目标，该试验将其作为一种肺癌的治疗方法。【原文：Novocure said on Wednesday that its cancer therapy met the main goal of a late-stage trial testing it as a treatment for a type of lung cancer.】

item.title: 受红海危机影响，快时尚零售商 H&M 推迟了部分宣传活动
item.description: 全球第二大上市时装零售商 H&M 公司首席执行官丹尼尔-埃尔弗（Daniel Erver）周三表示，公司推迟了部分春夏季活动的开始时间，以适应红海危机造成的运输延误。【原文：H&M , the world's second-biggest listed fashion retailer, postponed the start of some Spring/Summer campaigns to adjust to shipping delays caused by the Red Sea crisis, CEO Daniel Erver said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 债券持有人团体 "坚决反对 "中国开发商世茂提出的债务重组方案
item.description: 违约的中国开发商世茂集团的一批主要债券持有人周三表示，"坚决反对 "该公司重整115亿美元海外债务的提议，这给该公司在房地产行业危机加深之际的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：A group of major bondholders of defaulted Chinese developer Shimao Group said on Wednesday it "firmly opposes" the firm's proposal to revamp $11.5 billion of offshore debt, clouding its prospects amid a deepening crisis in the property sector.】

item.title: Moderna 从 Blackstone Life Sciences 获得 7.5 亿美元，用于开发流感疫苗
item.description: Moderna 周三表示，该公司已与私募股权公司 Blackstone 的生命科学投资平台达成协议，将出资 7.5 亿美元开发 mRNA 流感疫苗。【原文：Moderna said on Wednesday it has entered into an agreement with private equity firm Blackstone's life science investment platform for a funding of $750 million to develop its mRNA flu vaccines.】

item.title: 日产首席执行官表示，即使取消首次公开募股，日产仍将投资雷诺电动汽车部门
item.description: 日产汽车首席执行官周三表示，尽管法国汽车制造商雷诺决定不将其电动汽车部门上市，但日本日产汽车仍将投资该联盟合作伙伴的电动汽车部门。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor will invest in the electric vehicle unit of alliance partner Renault even though the French carmaker has decided not to list the unit, Nissan's CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: ProSieben 拒绝 MFE 分离德国广播公司的要求
item.description: 德国广播公司 ProSiebensat.1 周三回击了 MFE-MediaForEurope 拆分公司的计划，并呼吁股东在下个月的年度股东大会上投票否决主要投资者的提议。【原文：German broadcaster ProSiebensat.1 on Wednesday pushed back against a plan by MFE-MediaForEurope to split up the company and called on shareholders to vote down its top investors' proposals at the annual general meeting next month.】
